overview: Chris joined Triporati as CEO in December 2010, marking a return to online travel. From 1997 to 2002, Chris served as SVP, Leisure Travel & Partner Marketing with Preview Travel and Travelocity, with responsibility for the vacation package and cruise businesses as well as supplier relationships, advertising sales and travel planning content. Chris has also served as President, National Geographic Digital Media, and has held senior executive positions with technology publisher IDG and internet voice technology company Xtone Networks.
